title: Palo Alto Networks security advisory (AV25-587)
description: On September 10, 2025, Palo Alto Networks published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: Cortex XDR Microsoft 365 Defender Pack 4.6.0 windows  versions prior to 4.6.5
User-ID Credential Agent 11.0.0 Windows  versions prior to 11.0.2-133
User-ID Credential Agent 11.0.0 Windows  versions prior to 11.0.3
Prisma Access Browser  version prior to 139.12.4.128
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
